item.forum: Like most pilots there was plenty to critique, but we were grateful for the feedback and took our listener comments seriously!
item.title: Everything to Everyone, Part 1
item.description: Part one of the Second Shift pilot episode, "Everything to Everyone"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: The adventure begins...
item.summary: Three college students from Boston find themselves mysteriously summoned to another world.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original
item.file: One of Andrea's draft scripts for the pilot, from before Brandon and John joined the team. Notable differences include Arkahn being named Arkady, and Jareth being an elf!
A demo recording of yet another early script.

item.title: Everything to Everyone, Part 2
item.description: Part two of the Second Shift pilot episode, "Everything to Everyone"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: The adventure continues with this episode, the second part of our pilot.
item.summary: Shauna, Katherine and Mike learn more about their new surroundings, and a possible path home.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Stupid Magic
item.description: Episode Three of Second Shift, "Stupid Magic"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: It isn't easy for anyone, fitting in three strangers from another world.
item.summary: To earn money during their time in Laundi, Shauna, Katherine and Mike become Zana's newest employees. While Katherine works with Zana, Fesmer begins to teach Shauna a bit of his "natural magic," dismaying and angering Jareth
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Come Down
item.description: Episode Four of Second Shift, "Come Down"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: For whom the bell tolls ..
item.summary: Zana and Katherine develop a strong working relationship, much to the frustration of Arkahn. Fesmer tries to get down to the business of "pig pie delivery," but does Mike understand the meaning of 'mute friend'?
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: The Day of Undying
item.description: Episode Five of Second Shift, "The Day of Undying"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: Dead or alive
item.summary: In the wake of the Undying attack, Katherine and Shauna try desperately to save Mike's life, but the Laundians are unsure if there is any hope. Zana decides to seek aide from an old friend at University, though doing so could expose everyone.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Six Weeks
item.description: Episode Six of Second Shift, "Six Weeks"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: Mike's fate revealed.
item.summary: Mike Archer has treated his time in Laundi as a cross between a strange dream and a liveaction video game. His actions have cost him his consciousness. Will they cost him his life? Mike's fate is revealed in this episode.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Benched
item.description: Episode Seven of Second Shift, "Benched"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: He's back, but is he better?
item.summary: After recovering from his coma, Mike struggles to come to terms with what has happened to him. Shauna, Fesmer and Jareth decide to take him to a brikka game in an attempt to cheer him up, but all does not go as planned.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Trust Me
item.description: Episode Eight of Second Shift, "Trust Me"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: How far would you go to defend your friends?
item.summary: While the others are at the Brikka game, Arkahn and Kath conflict over how far a good person can go to help a friend.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Civil War
item.description: Episode Nine of Second Shift, "Civil War"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: A foreigner has the power to make big changes, be they good or bad.
item.summary: Mike proposes a way to repay his debt to Zana, but everyone seems to have differing opinions and are ready to fight about it. Meanwhile Shauna tries to learn more about the meaning of her nightmares.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: The Dance
item.description: Episode Ten of Second Shift, "The Dance"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: The Festival of New Life.
item.summary: It is nearly the end of the year in Laundi. It is a time of renewal, when the Odi surges and so does the desire to celebrate. The Festival of New Life is the celebration that marks the beginning of five days of fun for everyone... and you cannot go to the party alone.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Retreat
item.description: Episode Eleven of Second Shift, "Retreat"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: A day off for our heroes leads to stories and surprises.
item.summary: Silver Night approaches, and with it comes Shauna's best chance at casting Shift... but she still can't quite put the pieces together. Meanwile, Zana suggests a day away from Laundi -- she closes the shop and everyone gets a great chance to enjoy themselves before saying goodbye.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Campfire Tales (live)
item.summary: Written for a live performance at the Arisia 2008 convention, this bonus story shares everyone else's tales from that night around the campfire when Zana first told the story of the hand of Doro.

item.title: Flight
item.description: Episode Twelve of Second Shift, "The Last Home You WIll Ever Know, Part One: Flight"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: The beginning of season one's thrilling climax!
item.summary: Having said her goodbyes, Shauna prepares to cast Shift and bring her and her friends' adventure to a close. Fortunately, all goes exactly as planned. Heh. Yeah, right.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Fight
item.description: Episode Thirteen of Second Shift, "The Last Home You WIll Ever Know, Part One: Flight"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: The beginning's end...
item.summary: The thrilling conclusion to season one of Second Shift! Can Shauna and her friends make it out of their predicament in time cast Shift? There's only one way to find out!
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Second Shift Report #3: Arkahn
item.description: The voicemail show relaunches with comments from the cast and crew about Arkahn. SPOILER ALERT -- avoid until you have finished Season One. If you want to be on the show, call 617-297bLUE or send an audio clip to daylight@gmail.com.

item.title: Third Shift
item.description: Episode 14 of Second Shift: "Third Shift"
item.freesound: By ToddBradley (http://freesound.iua.upf.edu/usersViewSingle.php?id=30464) whipped cream.wav (http://freesound.iua.upf.edu/samplesViewSingle.php?id=32921) making drink 3.wav (http://freesound.iua.upf.edu/samplesViewSingle.php?id=32917) making drink 1.wav (http://freesound.iua.upf.edu/samplesViewSingle.php?id=32915)
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: A year has passed...
item.summary: What happened with the Shift? Why did Arkahn show up in Boston crying? How did Shauna, Mike and Katherine's parents react? Is Antonio's still run by Mr. Chang?? Find out in our season premiere, "Third Shift"!
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Second Shift Report yr02 ep02: Charendraen
item.description: Andrea discusses charendraen, the constructed language of Laundi. If you want to be on the show, call 617-297bLUE or send an audio clip to daylight@gmail.com.
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: Andrea discusses charendraen, the constructed language of Laundi. SPOILER ALERT.
item.summary: Andrea discusses charendraen, the constructed language of Laundi. If you want to be on the show, call 617-297bLUE or send an audio clip to daylight@gmail.com.
item.keywords: second shift, 2SR, voicemail, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: While You Were Away
item.description: Episode 15 of Second Shift: "While You Were Away"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: They're baaaaack!
item.summary: Mike, Katherine and Arkahn are back in Laundi, but not everything (nor everyone) is the way they remember
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: The Trial, Part 1
item.description: Episode 16 of Second Shift: "The Trial, Part 1"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: A trial of law, a trial of principles
item.summary: Arkahn's trial begins as Mike and Katherine are held in "protective custody" at the university. Jareth is torn between duty to his people and sympathy for his friends and Fesmer continues to consort with a mysterious, unseen stranger.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: The Trial, Part 2
item.description: Episode 17 of Second Shift: "The Trial, Part 2"
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: Endings and beginnings
item.summary: Mike, Katherine and Fesmer learn the verdict of Arkahn's trial and plot her rescue, while Jareth is caught in the middle.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Knowledge Gained
item.description: Episode 18 of Second Shift: Knowledge Gained
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: No place to go but west.
item.summary: On the run from University and the Legion, our heroes set out to discover what happened to Shauna. Along the way, their investigations uncover things even stranger than what they'd expected.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Innocence Lost
item.description: Episode 19 of Second Shift: Innocence Lost
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: Knowledge Gained is Innocence Lost.
item.summary: It's been over a year since Shauna Brown shifted her friends back to Boston. Left exhausted, surrounded by Undying, what became of the one her friends now search for so desperately? This episode tells her story.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Dark and Stormy
item.description: Episode 20 of Second Shift: Dark and Stormy
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: Three college students, an old woman, a fugitive, a scholar and a mage walk into a bar...
item.summary: The search for Shauna takes the group to a small town where bad weather strands them at an inn. Nothing to do but sit back, have a few drinks and take in some of the local... color.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: How the Other Half Lives
item.description: Episode 21 of Second Shift: How the Other Half Lives
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: The group has almost caught up with their old friend, but another figure from their past intervenes.
item.summary: Arriving in a new town, hot on the trail (they hope) of Shauna, the team is beset by internal struggles and an old enemy out for revenge.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.description: The Second Shift Update for January, 2009 announcing the upcoming release of episode 2.09, our live performance at Arisia and more!

item.title: Conspiracy of Silence
item.description: Episode 22 of Second Shift: Conspiracy of Silence
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: The end of one journey, the beginning of another
item.summary: Shauna and Porec arrive in Sonsa, the holy city of Oren, where Shauna finds that the people live by a very different set of rules.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Revolution, Part 1
item.description: Episode 23 of Second Shift: Revolution, Part 1
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: Nothing will stop them... but does everyone want the same thing?
item.summary: The group carries on, finally reaching Velia, a hotbed of Legion activity. But the events of the last year have taken a toll and no one remains the same.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Revolution, Part 2
item.description: Episode 24 of Second Shift: Revolution, Part 2
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: Revelations, relations and an old legend returned
item.summary: Zana is reunited with her old compatriots, Jareth confronts the secrets of University, and Katherine and Mike continue to search for Shauna
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Revelation (file one of two)
item.description: Episode 25 of Second Shift: Revelation (file one of two)
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: Everyone has a past...
item.summary: Badly injured, Zana confides in her companions the secrets of her past
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Revelation (file two of two)
item.description: Episode 25 of Second Shift: Revelation (file one of two)
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: Everyone has a past...
item.summary: Badly injured, Zana confides in her companions the secrets of her past (this is the continuation of file 1)
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original
item.file: There were some disagreements with regard to certain plot points in this episode. No one seems to remember exactly what those disagreements were, but as a compromise a set of "alternate" scenes were written and recorded, so we could decide which ones to use during post-production. Most of these ended up in the final version (one reason the episode became so long), with a few modifications and cuts.

Months before the episode's official release, this "mostly stand-alone" episode was performed live at the Arisia scifi convention. Unfortunately, the very end of the video was lost, so be prepared for it to cut out before the episode is over. :(
item.title: Dreams
item.description: Episode 26 of Second Shift: Dreams
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: Sometimes waking is stranger than dreaming
item.summary: Shauna awakes back in Boston after the strangest dream of her life. Wait... what?
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Promises
item.description: Episode 27 of Second Shift: Promises
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: Into the heart of Oren's power...
item.summary: Mike, Katherine, Fesmer, Dita, Arkahn, Jareth and Porec finally arrive at Oren's citadel, Sonsa, but do they really have a common goal?
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.title: Summoned, Part 1
item.description: Episode 28 of Second Shift: Summoned, Part 1
item.author: Blue Sky Red Entertainment
item.subtitle: What do you do when you find what you seek?
item.summary: Friends old and new are reunited at last, and the final chapter of Second Shift begins.
item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original

item.keywords: second shift, blue sky red, Podplay, podiobook, fantasy, serial, radio play, original
